ðŸ“– Summary: Lumolight is an open-source Android flashlight application offering both front and back flash capabilities. It features a modern Material You design with theming support and extensive customization options, including color selection, brightness control, and blinking frequency. The app also provides convenient tile support and volume key brightness adjustment for enhanced usability.
